text: Frank Delaney (24 October 1942 – 22 February 2017) was an Irish novelist, journalist and broadcaster.Hero sets forth for the love of the Irish – USATODAY.com He was the author of the New York Times best-seller Ireland,The New York Times > Opinion > Op-Ed Contributor: Holy Rollers and Papal Perfectas the non-fiction book Simple Courage: A True Story of Peril on the Sea, and many other works of fiction, non-fiction and collections.Frank Delaney's top 10 Irish novels | Books | guardian.co.uk Delaney was born in Tipperary, Ireland.Frank Delaney – Authors – Random House ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Irish journalists Category:Irish novelists
title: Frank Delaney
